ai_questions.topicName_real: a person you know who enjoys dressing well
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: someone in your life who takes particular care with their appearance
points_original: Who the person is
What job/studies the person does
What sort of clothes the person wears
And explain why you think this person enjoys dressing well
points_rewrite: identify this individual
describe their occupation or field of study
explain their typical fashion choices
share your perspective on their motivation for dressing well

ai_questions.topicName_real: a time when you forgot an appointment
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an occasion when you missed a scheduled commitment
points_original: When and where the appointment was
Why you forgot the appointment
What happened after you forgot the appointment
And explain how you felt about forgetting the appointment
points_rewrite: specify the time and location of the missed appointment
explain the reasons for your oversight
describe the consequences of missing the appointment
express your emotional reaction to this situation

ai_questions.topicName_real: a time when you saw a lot of plastic waste in a natural environment
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an instance of encountering significant plastic pollution in nature
points_original: When and where you saw this plastic waste
How you think this plastic waste got there
Why you noticed it
And explain how you felt about seeing plastic waste in this natural environment
points_rewrite: indicate the time and location of this observation
share your theories about the origin of this pollution
explain what drew your attention to it
describe your emotional response to witnessing this environmental issue

ai_questions.topicName_real: a friend from childhood who you remember very well
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a particularly memorable childhood companion
points_original: Who the friend is
How you met him/her
What you used to do together
And explain why you remember this childhood friend so well
points_rewrite: identify this childhood friend
recount how your friendship began
describe your shared activities
explain what makes this friend especially memorable to you

ai_questions.topicName_real: an object that you think is very beautiful
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a particularly aesthetically pleasing item
points_original: What the object is
Where you first saw the object
What it looks like
And explain how you feel about this beautiful object
points_rewrite: identify this beautiful object
describe the circumstances of your first encounter with it
provide a detailed description of its appearance
express your personal appreciation for this object

ai_questions.topicName_real: someone from another culture who you enjoy spending time with
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a culturally diverse acquaintance whose company you appreciate
points_original: Who this person is
What his/her cultural background is
When and where you met this person
And explain why you enjoy spending time with this person from another culture
points_rewrite: Identify this individual and your relationship with them
Describe their cultural heritage and background
Explain the circumstances of your first meeting
Share what makes your cross-cultural interactions enjoyable

ai_questions.topicName_real: the home of somebody who you know well
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a familiar residence that holds significance for you
points_original: Whose home this is
How often you go there
What this home looks like
And explain how you feel about this person's home
points_rewrite: Specify the homeowner and your connection to them
Indicate the frequency of your visits
Provide a detailed description of the residence
Express your emotional response to this living space

ai_questions.topicName_real: a film/movie you enjoyed and would like to see again
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a memorable cinematic experience worth revisiting
points_original: What the film/movie was
When and where you saw the film/movie
What the film/movie was about
And explain why you would like to see this film/movie again
points_rewrite: Name the film and its basic details
Describe the viewing circumstances (time and place)
Summarize the plot or central theme
Explain what makes this film worthy of rewatching

ai_questions.topicName_real: a photo you took that you are proud of
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a personally meaningful photographic achievement
points_original: Who or what was in your photo
When you took the photo
Why you took it
And explain why you are proud of this photo you took
points_rewrite: Describe the subject matter of the photograph
Specify when the photo was captured
Explain your motivation for taking this picture
Share what makes this photo special to you

ai_questions.topicName_real: a novel or a story you have read that you thought was particularly interesting
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a particularly engaging literary work you've encountered
points_original: Why you read the novel/story
What the novel/story was about
How long it took you to read it
And explain why you thought this novel/story was so interesting
points_rewrite: Explain your initial reason for reading this work
Summarize the narrative or central themes
Indicate the duration of your reading experience
Analyze what made this story compelling to you

ai_questions.topicName_real: a time when you disagreed with somebody about something
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an instance when you had a difference of opinion with someone
points_original: Who you disagreed with
What you disagreed about
What the result of this disagreement was
And explain how you felt about disagreeing with this person
points_rewrite: Identify the person you had the disagreement with
Describe the subject or issue of your disagreement
Explain the outcome or resolution of the disagreement
Share your emotional response to this conflict situation

ai_questions.topicName_real: a time when you had to find some information
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an occasion when you needed to research information
points_original: What kind of information you had to find
Where you looked for the information
How much you enjoyed looking for the information
And explain why you needed the information
points_rewrite: Specify the type of information you were seeking
Describe the sources or methods you used in your search
Evaluate how enjoyable or interesting the research process was
Explain the purpose or importance of obtaining this information

ai_questions.topicName_real: an English lesson that you really enjoyed
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a particularly memorable English language learning experience
points_original: Where the lesson took place
What the lesson was about
What the teacher did
And explain why you enjoyed this lesson so much
points_rewrite: Describe the setting or location of the lesson
Explain the topic or focus of the instructional content
Detail the teaching methods or activities the instructor used
Analyze what made this lesson especially enjoyable for you

ai_questions.topicName_real: a time when you succeeded in doing something that was difficult
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an achievement where you overcame significant challenges
points_original: What you succeeded in doing
Why it was difficult to do
How much help you needed
And explain how you felt when you succeeded in doing this difficult thing
points_rewrite: Describe the specific accomplishment or goal you achieved
Explain the challenges or obstacles that made it difficult
Indicate the level of assistance or support you required
Share your emotional reaction to this personal achievement

ai_questions.topicName_real: a time when someone gave you some money as a gift
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an occasion when you received monetary gift
points_original: Who gave you the money
Why they gave it to you
What you did with it
And explain how you felt about receiving this money
points_rewrite: Identify the person who gifted you the money
Explain the occasion or reason for this financial gift
Describe how you utilized or spent the money
Express your feelings about receiving this monetary present

ai_questions.topicName_real: a time when you had to share something with another person or other people
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an experience of sharing resources or possessions with others
points_original: What you had to share
Who you had to share with
Why you had to share

points_rewrite: Specify the item or resource you shared
Identify the individual(s) you shared with
Explain the circumstances that required sharing
Describe your emotional response to this sharing experience

points_original: What the programme was about
Where you watched this programme
Who you watched it with
And explain why you enjoyed this programme so much
points_rewrite: Summarize the program's content or theme
Describe the viewing platform or location
Identify any viewing companions
Analyze what made this program especially enjoyable

ai_questions.topicName_real: a part of your country that you would recommend to visitors
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a noteworthy region in your nation worth visiting
points_original: Which part of your country you would recommend
How you know about this part of your country
Whether many visitors go there
And explain why you would recommend this part of your country to visitors
points_rewrite: Identify the specific region or location
Explain your personal familiarity with the area
Comment on its popularity with tourists
Highlight the features that make it worth visiting

ai_questions.topicName_real: something important that you learned, not in school or college
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a significant life lesson acquired outside formal education
points_original: What you learned
How you learned it
How easy/difficult it was to learn
And explain why learning this was important to you
points_rewrite: Describe the knowledge or skill acquired
Explain the learning process or experience
Assess the level of challenge involved
Articulate the personal significance of this learning

What plants this person enjoys growing

ai_questions.topicName_real: a popular place for playing sport that you know about
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a well-known sports facility in your area
points_original: Where this place for playing sport is
How you know about this place
Whether you have visited this place
And explain why you think this place for playing sport is popular
points_rewrite: Specify the location of this sports venue
Describe how you became familiar with this facility
Indicate if you have personal experience visiting it

points_original: Who the person is

ai_questions.topicName_real: a time when you made a decision to wait for something
ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: an instance when you chose to practice patience for an outcome
points_original: What you decided to wait for
What you did while you were waiting
How you felt while you were waiting
And explain why deciding to wait was a good/bad decision
points_rewrite: Specify the anticipated event or result you waited for
Describe how you occupied yourself during the waiting period
Express your emotional state during this waiting time
Evaluate the wisdom of your decision to wait

ai_questions.topicName_rewrite: a location you visited for recreational outdoor pursuits
points_original: Where you went and when
What outdoor activity you did at this place

points_rewrite: Identify the location and time of your visit

Explain your motivation for choosing this activity

What the decision was about
Why you made the decision together

points_rewrite: Specify the timing and rationale behind this joint decision
Describe the nature and subject of the decision
Explain the collaborative aspect of your decision-making process

How you knew him/her

Describe the circumstances of how you met
